snippet.title: Intro Cut Scene - BLESSED BURDEN
snippet.description:
Wishlist and play demo on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2379230/Blessed_Burden/

Blessed Burden is the most-aesthetically charged horror adventure with first-person platforming in which you play the last surviving priest in a religious apocalypse.

Making his way through trap-filled tunnels and labyrinths, the main character searches for the Book of Relics which contains a secret of how to reincarnate the world after the apocalyptic religious war.

Twitter (X): https://twitter.com/podoba_interact
